mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_weeklysalary (user_id, basic_salary, worked_hour, gross_sale, commission_rate, gross_salary, net_salary, created_date, comment) VALUES (#{userID},#{basicSalary},#{workedHour}, #{grossSale},#{commissionRate},#{grossSalary}, #{netSalary},#{createDate},#{comment})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_weeklysalary SET basic_salary = #{basicSalary}, worked_hour = #{workedHour}, gross_sale = #{grossSale}, commission_rate = #{commissionRate}, gross_salary = #{grossSalary}, net_salary = #{netSalary}, created_date = #{createDate}, comment = #{comment} WHERE (user_id = #{userID})
